venue.name: Waterville Valley Ski Touring Center, Town Square

item.description:
This will be my first time skiing at Waterville Valley. I plan to leave Boston around 7:30 and begin skiing around 10 am. I may be able to take one rider and plan to be back in Boston by 5 pm. Hope to see you there!
http://www.waterville.com/nordic/nordic-conditions.html

Â 

Directions from Boston

130 miles, 2 hours. Take I-93 N to Exit 28, then 11 miles via Rt. 49 to resort village.
item.how_to_find_us: I will provide my contact info later this week.

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Waterville Valley XC Ski
